title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2602.2 - Neighborhood condition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2602.2 - Neighborhood condition

State Regulations
(a) Relevant, current and verifiable data, including but not limited to the most
recent census data, pertaining to such neighborhood must demonstrate that the
neighborhood has sustained physical deterioration, decay, neglect, disinvestment or displacement of low income people. (b) The neighborhood must contain a
significant amount of deteriorating or substandard buildings not being
adequately repaired, renovated, upgraded, modernized or rehabilitated under
existing programs to provide sound housing, and retail and service
establishments which are affordable to the residents and local business persons
of such neighborhoods. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2602.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
